com.scalar.dl.ledger.validation

Interface LedgerValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContractValidator, HashValidator, NonceValidator, OutputValidator, PrevHashValidator

    public interface LedgerValidator
    An abstraction for validators. Validators will be used to determine whether various properties of InternalAssets are valid.
